subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cespedes, 29, who will be a free agent after the 2015 season, is an often-dynamic player who hits with power from the right side and has a strong throwing arm from left field.
snippet: Cespedes, 29, who will be a free agent after the 2015 season, is an often-dynamic player who hits with power from the right side and has a strong throwing arm from left field.
